channel.title: How To make an Account Member on a Server
channel.description: Ok i am new to coding and i need to know how to make an acc member. thanks

item.title: How To make an Account Member on a Server
item.dc:creator: @Austin2 -Austin-
item.description:
@Austin2 wrote:

lets say someones username is austin, do ::makememaustin then kick twice, it should work, all servers with mem have makemem command

item.title: How To make an Account Member on a Server
item.dc:creator: @ZeroPulse ZeroPulse
item.description:
@ZeroPulse wrote:

Search for:

outStream.writeByteA(1); in the initialize method in client class

and replace with:

outStream.writeByteA(members);

also, add this variable:

public int members = 0; // 1 = members - 0 = free

I will not tell you the rest if you wish to make member-per-account, you will have to learn.

Thanks

Luke.

Read full topic
item.source: How To make an Account Member on a Server

if its already 1 then there already a mem
